checks.finding: Window dimensions provided but opening area calculations not shown; casement windows (A1, A2, D1, D2) in sleeping rooms need verification.
Windows in sleeping rooms are 5'-0" height (60"), exceeds 24" minimum.
Casement window width 3'-0" shown but net clear opening width requires verification with actual operable sash.
Window schedule shows head heights but sill heights not specified for bedroom windows.
Owners Suite, Suite #1, and Suite #2 shown but specific egress window locations not clearly marked on floor plans.
Main stair shows 15 risers with note 'TYP RISER HEIGHT, VARY AS NEEDED' but actual riser height not calculated or specified.
Tread depth not specified on stair details (A2.3).
Stair width not dimensioned on floor plans or stair details.
Headroom clearance not shown on building sections or stair details.
Handrail height not specified on stair details.
Notes specify guardrails required at openings >30" above finished floor at both first and second floors.
FBC requires 42" guardrail at all locations >30" above grade; plan shows 36" at first floor (should be 42") and 42" at second floor (correct).
Notes specify 4" sphere test up to 34" height, meets code requirement.
Electrical notes specify receptacles not more than 12'-0" from any point along wall.
GFCI specified for kitchen countertops on electrical plan notes.
GFCI specified for bathrooms, receptacles within 3'-0" of basin edge per notes.
GFCI specified for garage on electrical plan notes.
AFCI specified for all bedrooms and habitable rooms per electrical notes on E1.1 and E1.2.
Notes specify smoke detector in each bedroom (Owners Suite, Suite #1, Suite #2).
Notes specify smoke detector outside each sleeping area and on each story.
Notes specify CO detector on each level with fuel fired appliance and on each level with bedroom.
Wind speed not specified on cover sheet or structural notes; Hawthorne, FL location requires verification.
Wind exposure category not specified on plans.
Plans note 'SEE ATTACHED STRUCTURAL ENGINEER'S DRAWINGS' but structural details not included in extracted data.
Wall section A5.2 shows garage wall details but specific drywall thickness and fire rating not clearly specified.
Door 303 specified as '20 MIN FIRE RATED, SELF-CLOSING' connecting garage to house.

checks.description: No openings from garage to bedrooms
checks.finding: Floor plans show no direct garage access to bedrooms; garage connects through laundry/entry areas only.
Wall sections reference insulation but R-values not specified; cover sheet notes 'VERIFY W/ ATTACHED ENERGY CALCULATIONS'.
Wall insulation not specified on wall sections A5.1 and A5.2.
Window schedule notes 'DBL GLAZED, LOW-E, INSULATED' but U-factor not specified; energy calculations referenced but not provided.
